### Datadog_ServiceConfig

>  Datadog_ServiceConfig (output_mode:str='cloud',
>                             cloud_provider:str='datadog',
>                             api_key:Optional[str]=None,
>                             app_key:Optional[str]=None,
>                             site:str='datadoghq.com', service:str='dc_logger',
>                             env:str='production')

``` python
dds = Datadog_ServiceConfig(
    api_key = 123
)
```
